title: 109_s673
content: Governmental Pension Plan Equalization Act of 2005 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code (IRC) and the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 (ERISA) to specify that rules for governmental plans also apply to plans established for their employees by Indian tribal governments or their subdivisions, agencies, instrumentalities, or entities which they wholly own or control. Amends the IRC and the Taxpayer Relief Act of 1997 to extend to all governmental plans the prohibition against application to State and local plans of certain nondiscrimination rules . Subjects tribal governments to the same defined benefit plan rules and regulations applied to State and other local governments, their police and firefighters.
